eu.id3.face

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.id3.face.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a Image object of the Face module.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • correctGamma

        public void correctGamma(int contrast,
                         int brightness,
                         float gamma)
                  throws FaceException
        Applies a gamma correction to the image object.
        Parameters:
        contrast - Contrast coefficient to apply. Range is [-255;255]. Default value is 0.
        brightness - Brightness coefficient to apply. Range is [-255;255]. Default value is 0.
        gamma - Gamma coefficient to apply. Range is [0.25;2.50]. Default value is 1.00.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • downscale

        public float downscale(int maxSize)
                throws FaceException
        Downscales an image so that its maximum dimension equals the given maximum size while preserving the aspect ratio. If the maximum dimension is already smaller than the given maximum size, the function does nothing and the returned scale ratio is 1.
        Parameters:
        maxSize - Maximum size to fit the image in. Range is [1:+inf[.
        Returns:
        Applied scale ratio. Range is ]0:1].
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • extractRoi

        public Image extractRoi(Rectangle bounds)
                 throws FaceException
        Extracts a region of interest in the image object according to the given bounds.
        Parameters:
        bounds - Bounds of the crop to extract.
        Returns:
        Extracted region of interest.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • flip

        public void flip(boolean flipHorizontally,
                 boolean flipVertically)
          throws FaceException
        Flips the image object.
        Parameters:
        flipHorizontally - Set to 'true' to flip horizontally the image.
        flipVertically - Set to 'true' to flip vertically the image.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • fromBuffer

        public static Image fromBuffer(byte[] data,
                               PixelFormat pixelFormat)
                        throws FaceException
        Imports the image object from a buffer.
        Parameters:
        data - Buffer to import the image object from.
        pixelFormat - The destination pixel format to convert the input to.
        Returns:
        Created image.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

        public static Image fromFile(java.lang.String filepath,
                             PixelFormat pixelFormat)
                      throws FaceException
        Imports the image object from a file.
        Parameters:
        filepath - Path to the file to import the image object from.
        pixelFormat - The destination pixel format to convert the input to.
        Returns:
        Created image.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • fromRawBuffer

        public static Image fromRawBuffer(byte[] pixels,
                                  int width,
                                  int height,
                                  int stride,
                                  PixelFormat srcPixelFormat,
                                  PixelFormat dstPixelFormat)
                           throws FaceException
        Imports the image object from a raw buffer.
        Parameters:
        pixels - Buffer containing the pixels of the image.
        width - Width in pixels of the image.
        height - Height in pixels of the image.
        stride - Stride in pixels of the image.
        srcPixelFormat - The source pixel format of the input image.
        dstPixelFormat - The destination pixel format to convert the input image to.
        Returns:
        Created image.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • fromYuvPlanes

        public static Image fromYuvPlanes(byte[] yPlane,
                                  byte[] uPlane,
                                  byte[] vPlane,
                                  int yWidth,
                                  int yHeight,
                                  int uvPixelStride,
                                  int uvRowStride,
                                  PixelFormat dstPixelFormat)
                           throws FaceException
        Imports the image object from YUV planes.
        Parameters:
        yPlane - Buffer containing the Y plane.
        uPlane - Buffer containing the U plane.
        vPlane - Buffer containing the V plane.
        yWidth - Width in pixels of the Y plane.
        yHeight - Height in pixels of the Y plane.
        uvPixelStride - Pixel-level stride in pixels of the U and V planes.
        uvRowStride - Row-level stride in pixels of the U and V planes.
        dstPixelFormat - The destination pixel format to convert the input image to.
        Returns:
        Created image.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • reallocate

        public void reallocate(int width,
                       int height,
                       PixelFormat pixelFormat)
                throws FaceException
        Reallocates the internal memory of an image object from parameters. If the given parameters are the same as the ones of the object, then there is nothing done in this function.
        Parameters:
        width - Width to reallocate the image object to.
        height - Height to reallocate the image object to.
        pixelFormat - Pixel format to reallocate the image object to.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • resize

        public void resize(int width,
                   int height)
            throws FaceException
        Resizes the image object to the required width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - Width to resize the image object to.
        height - Height to resize the image object to.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(int angle)
            throws FaceException
        Rotates the image object of the required angle. The rotation is performed counter-clockwise.
        Parameters:
        angle - Counter-clockwise angle to apply. Supported values are [0, 90, 180, 270].
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String filepath,
                 float compressionLevel)
          throws FaceException
        Exports the image object to a file. The compression level meaning depends on the used algorithm: - For JPEG compression, the value is the expected quality and may vary from 1 to 100. - For JPEG2000 compression, the value is the compression rate and may vary from 1 to 512. - For PNG compression, the value is the compression rate and may vary from 1 to 10. - For all other formats, the value is ignored.
        Parameters:
        filepath - Path to the file to export the image object to.
        compressionLevel - Compression level to apply.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • toBuffer

        public byte[] toBuffer(ImageFormat imageFormat,
                       float compressionLevel)
                throws FaceException
        Exports the image object to a buffer. The compression level meaning depends on the used algorithm: - For JPEG compression, the value is the expected quality and may vary from 1 to 100. - For JPEG2000 compression, the value is the compression rate and may vary from 1 to 512. - For PNG compression, the value is the compression rate and may vary from 1 to 10. - For all other formats, the value is ignored.
        Parameters:
        imageFormat - The image format to export the image to.
        compressionLevel - Compression level to apply.
        Returns:
        Buffer to export the image object to.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • toBufferObject

        public void toBufferObject(ImageFormat imageFormat,
                           float compressionLevel,
                           ImageBuffer buffer)
                    throws FaceException
        Exports the image object to a buffer object. The compression level meaning depends on the used algorithm: - For JPEG compression, the value is the expected quality and may vary from 1 to 100. - For JPEG2000 compression, the value is the compression rate and may vary from 1 to 512. - For PNG compression, the value is the compression rate and may vary from 1 to 10. - For all other formats, the value is ignored.
        Parameters:
        imageFormat - The image format to export the image to.
        compressionLevel - Compression level to apply.
        buffer - Buffer object to export the image object to.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • transpose

        public void transpose()
               throws FaceException
        Transposes the image object.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.
